musicians.all: SELECT ?Musician ?Age (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) ?Band WHERE { ?Musician a ?SubClass. OPTIONAL { ?Musician musica:et\u00E0 ?Age . } OPTIONAL {?Band musica:haComponente ?Musician .} FILTER(?SubClass != musica:Musicista && EXISTS{ ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf musica:Musicista})} group by ?Musician ?Age ?Band
musicians.only_bands: SELECT ?Musician ?Age ?Band WHERE { ?Band musica:haComponente ?Musician . OPTIONAL {?Musician musica:et\u00E0 ?Age}} ORDER BY ?Band
musicians.only_solists: SELECT ?Musician ?Age (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) WHERE { ?Musician a ?SubClass. OPTIONAL { ?Musician musica:età ?Age . } OPTIONAL {?Band musica:haComponente ?Musician .} FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?Musician musica:componenteDi ?Band } && ?SubClass != musica:Musicista && EXISTS{ ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf musica:Musicista})} group by ?Musician ?Age

albums: SELECT ?owner ?album ?sales ?Certificate ?outDate WHERE {{?band a musica:Band .?band musica:bandHaAlbum ?album .BIND(?band AS ?owner) OPTIONAL {?album musica:haCertificato ?Certificate. } { ?album musica:numeroVendite ?sales. } OPTIONAL { ?album musica:dataUscita ?outDate. } } UNION { ?musician a musica:Musicista . ?musician musica:haAlbum ?album . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?band a musica:Band . ?band musica:bandHaAlbum ?album . } BIND(?musician AS ?owner) OPTIONAL {?album musica:haCertificato ?Certificate .} { ?album musica:numeroVendite ?sales. } OPTIONAL { ?album musica:dataUscita ?outDate. } }}
songs: SELECT ?Song (group_concat(?Writer; separator=", ") as ?Writers) ?Album WHERE { ?AlbumItem a musica:Album. OPTIONAL {?AlbumItem musica:contiene ?SongItem .} OPTIONAL {?SongItem musica:scrittoDa ?Writer .} ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song } GROUP BY ?Album ?Song
genres: SELECT ?Genre (COUNT(?Song) AS ?Songs) WHERE { ?Genre a musica:GenereMusicale. ?Song musica:haGenere ?Genre. } GROUP BY ?Genre
events: SELECT ?Event ?Host ?City ?Nation ?Continent WHERE {?Host musica:ospiteDi ?Event. ?Event musica:situatoIn ?City. ?City musica:situatoIn ?Nation. ?Nation musica:situatoIn ?Continent}
